name: ZerCeption - Are you in control?
description:
Everything was going great, until Everyone started running away. 

You are expected to leave as well, but will you?

CONTROLS:

Z , X , and the ARROW Keys.

Thank you for giving me your time...

Any kind of criticism is appreciated!

So please comment!

Needless to say, still in development currently sucks.
